name: 邦妮斯特迪文特
awards: 2014年 第29届美国独立精神奖 罗伯特·奥特曼电影奖 污泥
name_full: 邦妮斯特迪文特 Bonnie Sturdivant
introduction: Bonnie the daughter of Conner and Kathryn Sturdivant. She was a graduate of Wimberley High School and St. Edward's University - Austin, Texas.Bonnie was always involved in music and acting starting at the very ripe age of two. From starring in the local musicals and plays to fulfilling her dream of becoming a film actress, as well as writing and performing her own songs, Bonnie certainly fit a lot into her short 31 years of life. She had a passion for leaving others in a better place than when she met them, whether that be by helping them along their spiritual journey or simply being a shoulder to lean on.She is preceded in death by her maternal grandmother, Janet Byers.She is survived by her mother, Kathryn Sturdi vant; father, Conner Sturdivant and stepmother, Mary Sturdivant; sister, Brittany Burke and husband Chad Burke and their three children (Dylan, Brayden & Hayden); sister, Brenna Sturdivant and boyfriend, Preston Weden; brother, Cullen Sturdivant; step-siblings, Logan & Jessica Praytor; maternal grandfather, Brad Byers; paternal grandparents, Dwight & Judy Sturdivant; and the love of her life, Bowen Johnson.
